text: Imana yonyene niyo ibagendesha ngaha kw’Isi no mubiyaga naho mwoba muri mumato yanyu nayo agendeshwa n’umuyaga mwiza ubanezereza, mu mwanya umuyaga ukaze ubashikiye n’imikuba y’amazi nayo ikabashikira iturutse kumpande zose, bagatangura kwiyumvira yuko basatirijwe hose, mugihe baca basaba Imana bayitakambira hamwe n’ubwitonzi ntangere bavuga bati:- niwaturokora kuri ibi, ntankeka twebwe tuzoba turi mu bantu bakenguruka
